0: The room was very modern and spacious
Both room were large enough to be not tripping over your bags and were modern and clean
The bass was palpable in my room and there was a lot of boisterous party ing in the courtyard below my window
Being able to get a smoking room was a nice addition and saved a few trips going outside the hotel before going out for the day night
15 minutes ’ walk from the city center very conveniently ubicated friendly staff very quiet clean rooms … but definitely could benefit from some work renovations updates
The rooms are spacious especially for European standards spotlessly clean and comfortable
The hotel provides big rooms with great amenties
The room was comfortable and clean
As a Gold Honors member I got access to the Executive Lounge OK evening snacks and liquor nothing to get excited about and a truly excellent breakfast in the main dining room in the morning
1: Rooms are big compared to European standards

However it was still a lovely room and the bathroom although one of the older style ones was still very nice and really well equipped

I was charged € 120 night over normal room rate for pre paid stay
